coded_answer.p: Circle theatre's Manager: I am writtingwriting to you because I felt dissapointeddisappointed after seeing the musical show "Over the Rainbow". There were many things that were wrong in the advertisement I saw. First the actors who were suppousedsupposed to star in this show were not the ones put in thereon stage. So when I saw the show I felt horrible, because I was expecting to see Danny Brook. But the problems started whilewhen I arrived at the place. I had a discount for itticket, but they refussedrefused it and I had to pay the full price. AppartApart from this, the show started fourty fiveforty fiveforty-five minutes laterlate. I think thisthese reasons are suficientlysufficientlysufficient enough to ask for my money back. So I hope that you will understand my point. Please be comprehensiveunderstanding and realize that your show was not cheap. I'm a student, so I do not have a lot of money and I need it back. I also hadhave to tell you that the theatre restaurant was closed because there were too few people there and they take me out of the place, so I was very upset. I will gocome to your office this week. I hope to see you there.

Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. He had talked to Caroline days before the secret was known. She had told him about theher relationship with her boyfriend. Everybody knew that Caroline and her boyfriend John, loved each other so much that it wouldn't be raresurprising to find that they had havehad sex together. The point here is, that Caroline choosedchose the worst friend to toldtell this to. She was also concerned about being pregnedpregnant, but she was afraid to toldtell John about it. So she decided to ask Pat what to do. When she finally told him, Pat reactreacted in a very wrongbad way and told rapidlyimmediately to Johntold John immediately. He couldn't belivedbelievedbelieve what Pat had told him, so he broke Pat's nose. Pat's father had to pay for a very expensive operation. But aslike every story this has a happy finalending. John and Caroline still love each other, and she wasn't pregnant at all, it was just her fantasyimagination. And Pat understood that secrets should die on your own.
